item.title: Music Group Promo - To create a History promo video of the band members - Upwork
item.description:
To create a video promo for a band from existing & extensive music videos and interviews. The band members have been very successful in the past under a previous moniker and the objective of this video is to demonstrate and highlight the legacy and heritage of the band members and that their new band name is an evolution of their band.

Time is of the essence, as this video need to be completed by the end of next week (5th July). It is essential to have a storyboard prepared by the successful freelance within a few days. The client will fully brief the successful freelance.

Please only apply if you have the passion and right attitude to work diligently with the client and understand that that there will probably be multiple re-cuts.


Budget: $100
Posted On: June 24, 2024 03:12 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Commercial, Video Editing, Adobe After Effects, Graphic Design
Skills: Video Commercial, Video Editing, Adobe After Effects, Graphic Design
Country: United Kingdom

item.title: UGC Creator for Short-Form Videos (TikTok & YouTube Shorts) - Upwork
item.description:
About Us:
We are Uncommon Web Design, a company dedicated to boosting the online presence of small businesses and startups. Our focus is on helping offline businesses with minimal online engagement transform their digital footprint through engaging, high-quality content. We're looking for a talented UGC (User-Generated Content) Creator to join our team and help create impactful short-form videos for TikTok and YouTube Shorts.

Responsibilities:

Create engaging and high-quality short-form videos tailored for TikTok and YouTube Shorts.
Appear in the videos, showcasing and narrating the stories of small business founders, their products, and services.
Collaborate with small business founders to highlight the unique aspects of their businesses, emphasizing their offline operations and current minimal use of online presence.
Develop content that resonates with the target audience, encouraging them to engage with the businesses online.
Stay updated with the latest trends and best practices in short-form video content creation.
Requirements:

Proven experience in creating successful short-form video content for TikTok and YouTube Shorts.
Comfortable appearing on camera and engaging with the audience.
Strong understanding of content trends, audience engagement, and video editing.
Ability to create compelling narratives and visually appealing content.
Excellent communication and collaboration skills.
Familiarity with the challenges and opportunities of small businesses and startups.
Creative mindset with the ability to think outside the box.
Preferred Qualifications:

Experience working with small businesses or startups.
Background in digital marketing or content creation for businesses with minimal online engagement.
Portfolio showcasing previous work in short-form video content creation where you appeared on camera.


Posted On: June 24, 2024 02:58 UTC
Category: Acting
Skills:Middle-Aged Adult, Video Editing, Explainer Video
Skills: Middle-Aged Adult, Video Editing, Explainer Video
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: US-based UGC Creator Wanted for Mojada, Women's Enhancing Gel - Upwork
item.description:
Mojada, the ultimate all-natural libido-enhancing gel. Pronounced Mo-hada, this revolutionary formula is meticulously crafted to elevate and intensify your intimate experiences like never before.

Imagine tapping into the essence of your most primal desires, as Mojada seamlessly mimics the natural juices that surge when arousal takes hold. Feel the rush of instant wetness, igniting your senses and heightening every touch.

But Mojada offers more than just physical sensation—it’s a catalyst for profound connection and ecstasy. Countless women have shared their stories of newfound tightness and heightened pleasure after embracing Mojada into their lives.

Crafted with care and precision, Mojada is more than just a product—it’s a promise. Our commitment to using only the finest, all-natural ingredients ensures a pure, allergen-free experience with no harmful side effects.

So, are you ready to embark on a journey of unparalleled pleasure? With Mojada by your side, embrace the wet, revel in the clean, and dive headfirst into a world of unforgettable fun.

Job Description:
- We are seeking a passionate and creative US-based ONLY UGC (User-Generated Content) Content Creator to join Grande Johnson and become the face of our brand. As a UGC Content Creator, you will be responsible for producing engaging and authentic content that resonates with our target audience across various social media platforms.
- Create 8-10 short-form TikTok videos for $250

*Responsibilities:
Create high-quality UGC video content showcasing Mojada and other products.
Collaborate with the team for concepts and marketing objectives.
Stay up-to-date with social media trends, platform updates, and industry best practices to continuously optimize content performance.

Content Examples we're looking for:
https://www.tiktok.com/@purfectkittycat/video/7379551576244948266
https://www.tiktok.com/@purfectkittycat/video/7380896150615772458

https://www.tiktok.com/@purfectkittycat/video/7364160656150433055
https://www.tiktok.com/@purfectkittycat/video/7330635878668242218

Requirements:
Preferably mid 20's - 40's Female with experience working with e-commerce brands.
Proven experience as a content creator for brands. Strong portfolio will be prioritized for selections.
Great photography and videography skills, with a keen eye for composition, lighting, and editing.
Strong communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to connect authentically with diverse audiences.
A natural storyteller who can connect to audiences, relatable and has strong interpersonal skill.
Experience with similar products is a PLUS.

Check our TikTok account: https://www.tiktok.com/@grandejohnson_

Attach your portfolio when you submit your proposal!


Budget: $250
Posted On: June 24, 2024 02:50 UTC

Skills: UGC, Video Advertising

item.title: Editing gaming videos for youtube - Upwork
item.description:
Hi,

I am looking to partner with a freelancer to edit recordings and VODS into shorter entertaining videos for YouTube.

The recording I was wanting to begin with is 2hrs in length, which is the typical length for our VODS, and I was hoping to have the youtube video be around 15mins.

I understand a number of people will have the essential skills with editing such as colour grading, motion graphics, subtitles ect. but we are also looking for someone who has a good sense of when moments are funny and how to bring out the comedic value of a moment with their editing.

I have set the job posting to hourly pay however I usually prefer to work on a fixed price basis. If you could also include a rough quote for which options works best for you that would be hugely appreciated.

We plan to do some test runs with a few of the top candidates so if you could include some of your previous work as reference that would be incredibly helpful.

I have attached below 3 different youtube videos as examples from 3 different milestones of subscribers, that we would like to model after.

If you have any questions or require further information please don't hesitate to reach out.

Thanks for your time.
Kind regards,
Lachlan.

https://youtu.be/BavRiqk1mtY?si=ruU0_6AW2DoSIbsW

https://youtu.be/JMsxBzUTKX8?si=LN6CKndfFiwGPEW3

https://youtu.be/Q4xCLO5l7aI?si=9jIktoV4MBVFHZWV


Posted On: June 24, 2024 02:35 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Audio Editing
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Audio Editing
Country: Australia
click to apply

item.title: Drone Operator Boca Raton Florida exterior office day and night video shots - Upwork
item.description:
hello
We have a client with a building in Boca Raton. We shot some videos inside their office and they would like to also include some exterior drone footage at both day and night that features the building and the company name on the building.

No editing required, just the raw footage for our video editor to cut into an existing video project.

10 minutes total footage. (5+ minutes during the day and 5+ minutes at night)

Looking to have this done this week. thanks.  Message me for the address and confirm a day that you can shoot during day light and evening hours. At night the company name sign on the building lights up.

Include an example of your exterior building drone footage.

Must be local to Boca Raton, FL.

Hourly Range: $60.00-$80.00

Category: Videography
Skills:Drone, Videography
Skills: Drone, Videography

item.title: 1 min video, 1 headshot, office b-roll & office lifestyle photos - Denver - Upwork
item.description:
We need a local Denver videographer / photographer with proven corporate style production to go to an office on July 8th or 9th at the Galleria at Cherry Creek to:

1. Shoot a 1 minute video where a partner of the accounting firm will describe a service they offer (sound, lighting, video - quality production).

2. Take a headshot photo and lifestyle photo of the partner at the office

3. Take 3 to 5 minutes of b-roll footage around the office and office view

4. Take photos of the office lifestyle (people working, desks, etc -- 10+ photos)

We will also need post-production editing of the 1 minute video. The person will be primarily sitting talking to the camera about their services, with some cutting to some of the office b-roll.

Deliver edited video (we will have an example to share so you can match style of existing 1-minute videos we have for this client), headshot, lifestyle photos and broll.

Share at least 3 work samples of corporate style video and photo -- your actual work.


Budget: $800
Posted On: June 24, 2024 02:26 UTC
Category: Videography
Skills:Photography, Video Production, Videography, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Photography, Video Production, Videography, Video Post-Editing
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: TikTok/Reels/Shorts Content Creator - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking talented freelancers to join our team as Content Creators for AlfredCamera, a leading home security app. As a Content Creator, you will be responsible for producing engaging video content primarily for social media platforms - TikTok, Instagram Reels, and Youtube Shorts.

Important: You will need a spare phone to be able to use AlfredCamera, and we will provide you with a Premium subscription for the duration of our collaboration.

Please learn more about our app here: https://alfred.camera/

You will create short-form video content featuring AlfredCamera, including but not limited to:
- App tutorials to educate users on how to maximize the app's functionalities.
- Demonstrations of AlfredCamera's features to showcase its capabilities.
- Announcements of new features and updates to keep users informed.
- Tips and tricks videos to provide valuable insights and usage hacks.
- Setup videos demonstrating AlfredCamera installations in your own home or apartment.
- Share footage recorded by AlfredCamera to demonstrate real-world scenarios and effectiveness.

The above involves voice-over and on-camera appearances.

You will be briefed with all the requirements when we need a new video.

Requirements:
- Proficiency in video creation and editing, with experience in creating content for social media platforms.
- Ability to clearly explain and demonstrate technical information related to app functionalities.
- Comfortable appearing on camera and providing voiceovers for videos.
- Creative mindset with the ability to generate innovative ideas for content.
- Native English speaker and Western-looking house/apartment

Hourly Range: $15.00-$20.00
Posted On: June 24, 2024 02:17 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production, Social Media Marketing, Social Media Management, Content Creation
Skills: Video Editing, Video Production, Social Media Marketing, Social Media Management, Content Creation
Country: Taiwan
click to apply

item.title: Camera Setup and Operation for Dance Video Shoot - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a highly skilled camera operator to help us with the setup and operation of 3 Panasonic 4k cameras to ensure the best possible quality for a dance video shoot. Additionally, we need assistance in setting up, balancing, and effectively using a 4th camera on a gimbal. The selected candidate will be responsible for ensuring that all cameras are properly positioned, focused, and calibrated to capture the dancers' movements and expressions accurately. This includes adjusting angles, lighting, and camera settings. Attention to detail and a good eye for composition are essential. The ideal candidate will have experience in camera operation, familiarity with Panasonic 4k cameras, and proficiency in using gimbals.
We are mainly looking for someone to teach us all this, rather than actually shoot the event.

Skills required:

- Camera operation
- Panasonic 4k cameras
- Gimbal operation
- Attention to detail
- Composition
- Lighting

We are located in Jamaica Estates, NY.

Budget: $250
Posted On: June 24, 2024 02:14 UTC
Category: Videography
Skills:Videography, Video Production, Camera, Video Editing
Skills: Videography, Video Production, Camera, Video Editing
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Facebook/Instagram/Tiktok Content creator/editor and Growth for Auto Detailing business - Upwork
item.description:
Job Title: Social Media Content Creator and Manager

Overview:
We are a small auto detailing company based in Michigan seeking a talented Social Media Content Creator and Manager to join our team remotely. The ideal candidate will be proficient in creating engaging video and photo content, editing for various platforms including Instagram, Facebook, and TikTok, and assisting in growing our social media presence.

Responsibilities:

Create high-quality video and photo content based on provided material (auto detailing work, before-and-after shots, customer testimonials, etc.).
Edit and optimize content for Instagram, Facebook, and TikTok, ensuring it aligns with platform best practices and aesthetic.
Develop creative and innovative strategies to grow our social media following and engagement.
Monitor social media channels and respond to comments, messages, and inquiries in a timely manner.
Collaborate with our team to brainstorm and execute new content ideas and campaigns.
Stay up-to-date with the latest trends, tools, and best practices in social media and content creation.
Requirements:

Proven experience as a Social Media Content Creator or similar role, with a portfolio of past work.
Proficiency in video and photo editing software (Adobe Premiere, Adobe Photoshop, etc.).
Strong understanding of social media platforms (Instagram, Facebook, TikTok) and their respective audiences.
Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
Ability to work independently, manage time effectively, and meet deadlines.
Passion for cars, auto detailing, or related industries is a plus.
Preferred:

Experience managing or growing social media accounts for small businesses.
Knowledge of SEO and content marketing principles.
Familiarity with analytics tools to track social media performance and engagement.
Terms:

This is a remote freelance position with flexible hours.
Compensation: To be discussed based on experience and portfolio.
Start Date: Immediate.
How to Apply:
Please submit your resume, portfolio (including social media handles you've managed), and a brief cover letter outlining your experience and interest in this role.

We look forward to hearing from you and seeing how your creativity can help us showcase our auto detailing expertise to a broader audience!

Hourly Range: $6.00-$25.00
Posted On: June 24, 2024 02:13 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:Social Media Marketing, Social Media Management, Instagram, Facebook, Social Media Content, Social Media Content Creation, Marketing Strategy
Skills: Social Media Marketing, Social Media Management, Instagram, Facebook, Social Media Content, Social Media Content Creation, Marketing Strategy
Country: United States
click to apply

Edit and optimize content for Instagram, Facebook, and TikTok, ensuring it aligns with platform best practices and aesthetic.
Develop creative and innovative strategies to grow our social media following and engagement.
Monitor social media channels and respond to comments, messages, and inquiries in a timely manner.
Collaborate with our team to brainstorm and execute new content ideas and campaigns.
Stay up-to-date with the latest trends, tools, and best practices in social media and content creation.
Requirements:

Proven experience as a Social Media Content Creator or similar role, with a portfolio of past work.
Proficiency in video and photo editing software (Adobe Premiere, Adobe Photoshop, etc.).
Strong understanding of social media platforms (Instagram, Facebook, TikTok) and their respective audiences.
Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
Ability to work independently, manage time effectively, and meet deadlines.
Passion for cars, auto detailing, or related industries is a plus.
Preferred:

Experience managing or growing social media accounts for small businesses.
Knowledge of SEO and content marketing principles.
Familiarity with analytics tools to track social media performance and engagement.
Terms:

This is a remote freelance position with flexible hours.
Compensation: To be discussed based on experience and portfolio.
Start Date: Immediate.
How to Apply:
Please submit your resume, portfolio (including social media handles you've managed), and a brief cover letter outlining your experience and interest in this role.

We look forward to hearing from you and seeing how your creativity can help us showcase our auto detailing expertise to a broader audience!

Hourly Range: $6.00-$25.00
